massmessage-content-invalid: This page does not contain a valid MassMessage delivery list.
massmessage-content-empty: There are no pages in this list.
massmessage-manage-header: Use this form to create or modify delivery lists for the MassMessage extension. List one title per line, and use title@domain (e.g. User talk:Example@en.wikipedia.org) to specify a page on a different wiki, if cross-wiki delivery is enabled.
massmessage-manage-exists: A page already exists at the specified title.
massmessage-manage-nopermission: You do not have permission to create or edit the list.
massmessage-manage-tojsonerror: The list could not be encoded for storage.
